Patrick,
 
There is already a defect on SourceForge for this. It works on Windows, but
not on Linux or OS X. If I start a VM on those OSes and the child VM invokes
System.exit(n), then the parent VM doesn't necessarily get n back when it
calls waitFor() on the Process.
 
Does anyone know how to portably communicate a termination code?
 
Regards,
 
Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute


  _____  

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Patrick Gundlach
Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2006 3:40 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] newbee: junit 4.1 tests fail



Hi,

I am a complete newbee to junit (and my java is rusted, as well): I
downloaded junit 4.1 and ran the test, but they fail (see below). Do I
have to be worried? What am I doing wrong? I Tried on Mac OS X and Linux.

Patrick
--------------------------------------------------
